name: RFL_CVG_TOD_ID
description: This table holds the bed day types (TOD) IDs for the related multi Auth-Cert Bed Days Type (I RFL 8501) item.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the referral.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the associated coverage for this referral record. Together with REFERRAL_ID, this forms the foreign key to the REFERRAL_CVG_BED table.

columns.name: AUTH_CERT_TOD_ID_BED_DAY_TYPE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the bed day type record (i.e. ICU or non-authorized.)
